trans-unit.source: : For operator,, the unary operator&, and the operator->, the set of built-in candidates is empty. For other operators built-in candidates are the ones listed in built-in operator pages as long as all operands can be implicitly converted to their parameters. If any built-in candidate has the same parameter list as a non-member candidate that isn't a function template specialization, it is not added to the list of built-in candidates. When the built-in assignment operators are considered, the conversions from their left-hand arguments are restricted: user-defined conversions are not considered.
trans-unit.target: ：对于 operator, 一元运算 operator& 和 operator-> ，内置候选集为空。对于其他运算符，内置候选者是内置运算符页面中列出的候选者，只要可以将所有操作数隐式转换为它们的参数即可。如果任何内置候选具有与非功能模板专业化的非成员候选相同的参数列表，则不会将其添加到内置候选列表中。考虑内置的赋值运算符时，其左手参数的转换受到限制：不考虑用户定义的转换。

trans-unit.source: : For the operators where operator overloading permits non-member forms, all declarations found by unqualified name lookup of operator@ in the context of the expression (which may involve ADL), except that member function declarations are ignored and do not prevent the lookup from continuing into the next enclosing scope. If both operands of a binary operator or the only operand of a unary operator has enumeration type, the only functions from the lookup set that become non-member candidates are the ones whose parameter has that enumeration type (or reference to that enumeration type)
trans-unit.target: ：对于其中运营商操作符重载允许非成员的形式，所有声明发现不合格的名称查找的 operator@ 的表达（其可能涉及的上下文ADL），不同之处在于成员函数声明被忽略，并且不妨碍查找从继续进入下一个封闭范围。如果二元运算符的两个操作数或一元运算符的唯一操作数都具有枚举类型，则查找集中唯一成为非成员候选者的函数就是其参数具有该枚举类型（或引用该枚举类型）的函数

trans-unit.source: : For the six relational operator expressions x==y, x!=y, x<y, x<=y, x>y, and x>=y, all member, non-member, and built-in operator<=>'s found are added to the set if x<=>y @ 0 is well-formed (meaning, <=> returns std::*_ordering and @ is one of ==, !=, <, >, <=, >=, or <=> returns std::*_equality and @ is one of ==, !=). Additionally, for the six relational operator expressions x==y, x!=y, x<y, x<=y, x>y, and x>=y as well as the three-way comparison expression x<=>y, a synthesized candidate with the order of the two parameters reversed is added for each member, non-member, and built-in operator<=>'s found if 0 @ y <=> x is well-formed. In each case, rewritten candidates are not considered in the context of the rewritten expression. For all other operators, the rewritten candidate set is empty.
trans-unit.target: ：对于六个关系运算符表达式 x==y ， x!=y ， x<y ， x<=y ， x>y 和 x>=y ，所有成员，非成员和内置 operator<=> 的发现被添加到集合，如果 x<=>y @ 0 是公形成（意味着， <=> 返回标准:: * _排序和@是一个 == ， != ， < ， > ， <= ， >= 或 <=> 返回std :: * _ equality，并且@是 == ， != 之一）。此外，对于六个关系运算符表达式 x==y ， x!=y ， x<y ， x<=y ， x>y 和 x>=y 以及三向比较表达式 x<=>y ，其顺序为如果 0 @ y <=> x 的格式正确，则会为每个成员，非成员和内置 operator<=> 添加反向的两个参数。在每种情况下，都不会在重写表达式的上下文中考虑重写候选。对于所有其他运算符，重写的候选集为空。

trans-unit.source: : constructs a shared_ptr which shares ownership information with the initial value of r, but holds an unrelated and unmanaged pointer ptr. If this shared_ptr is the last of the group to go out of scope, it will call the stored deleter for the object originally managed by r. However, calling get() on this shared_ptr will always return a copy of ptr. It is the responsibility of the programmer to make sure that this ptr remains valid as long as this shared_ptr exists, such as in the typical use cases where ptr is a member of the object managed by r or is an alias (e.g., downcast) of r.get()For the second overload taking an rvalue, r is empty and r.get() == nullptr after the call.(since C++20)
trans-unit.target: ：构造一个 shared_ptr ，它与初始值 r 共享所有权信息，但持有一个不相关且不受管理的指针 ptr 。如果此 shared_ptr 是超出范围的组的最后一个，它将为最初由 r 管理的对象调用存储的删除器。但是，在此 shared_ptr 上调用 get() 将始终返回 ptr 的副本。程序员有责任确保只要这个shared_ptr存在，此 ptr 仍然有效，例如在典型的使用案例中， ptr 是由以下对象管理的对象的成员： r 或是 r.get() 的别名（例如，向下转换）。对于第二次重载，使用rvalue，则 r 为空， r.get() == nullptr 调用后r.get（）== nullptr。（自C ++ 20起）

trans-unit.source: : defines the enumeration type but not its enumerators: after this declaration, the type is a complete type and its size is known. trans-unit.source: : first as if expression were an rvalue expression (thus it may select the move constructor), and if no suitable conversion is available, or if the type of the first parameter of the selected constructor is not an rvalue reference to the object's type (possibly cv-qualified), overload resolution is performed a second time, with expression considered as an lvalue (so it may select the copy constructor taking a reference to non-const).

trans-unit.source: Function templates other than user-defined conversion functions can use return type deduction. The deduction takes place at instantiation even if the expression in the return statement is not dependent. This instantiation is not in an immediate context for the purposes of SFINAE.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的转换函数以外的函数模板可以使用返回类型推导。即使return语句中的表达式不相关，推导也会在实例化时进行。就SFINAE而言，此实例化不是即时上下文。

trans-unit.source: Explicit instantiation declarations do not themselves instantiate function templates that use return type deduction.
trans-unit.target: 显式实例化声明本身并不实例化使用返回类型推导的函数模板。

trans-unit.source: Explicit instantiations may use the noexcept specifier, but it is not required. If used, the exception specification must be the same as for all other declarations. A diagnostic is required only if the exception specifications are not the same within a single translation unit.
trans-unit.target: 显式实例化可以使用noexcept说明符，但不是必需的。如果使用，则异常规范必须与所有其他声明相同。仅当单个翻译单元中的异常规范不同时才需要诊断。

trans-unit.source: POSIX specifies that in case of underflow, arg is returned unmodified, and if that is not supported, and implementation-defined value no greater than DBL_MIN, FLT_MIN, and LDBL_MIN is returned.
trans-unit.target: POSIX指定在发生下溢的情况下，返回的 arg 将保持不变，如果不支持，则返回不大于DBL_MIN，FLT_MIN和LDBL_MIN的实现定义的值。

trans-unit.source: POSIX specifies that in case of underflow, y/x is the value returned, and if that is not supported, and implementation-defined value no greater than DBL_MIN, FLT_MIN, and LDBL_MIN is returned.
trans-unit.target: POSIX指定在发生下溢的情况下， y/x 是返回的值，如果不支持，则返回不大于DBL_MIN，FLT_MIN和LDBL_MIN的实现定义的值。

trans-unit.source: POSIX specifies that in case of underflow, arg is returned unmodified, and if that is not supported, an implementation-defined value no greater than DBL_MIN, FLT_MIN, and LDBL_MIN is returned.
trans-unit.target: POSIX指定在发生下溢的情况下，返回的 arg 将保持不变，如果不支持，则返回不大于DBL_MIN，FLT_MIN和LDBL_MIN的实现定义的值。

trans-unit.source: POSIX additionally specifies that the situations specified to return FE_INVALID are domain errors.
trans-unit.target: POSIX还指定为返回 FE_INVALID 而指定的情况是域错误。

trans-unit.source: POSIX requires that a domain error occurs if x is infinite or y is zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果 x 为无限或 y 为零，则POSIX要求发生域错误。

trans-unit.source: POSIX specifies that errno is set on error. It also specifies additional conversion specifications, most notably support for argument reordering (n$ immediately after % indicates n'th argument).
trans-unit.target: POSIX指定该 errno 设置上的错误。它还指定了附加的转换规范，最显着的是支持参数重排序（紧接在 % 后的 n$ 表示第 n 个参数）。

trans-unit.source: POSIX specifies that underflow may only occur when both arguments are subnormal and the correct result is also subnormal (this forbids naive implementations).
trans-unit.target: POSIX指定仅当两个参数都为非正规且正确的结果也为非正规时才可能发生下溢（这禁止幼稚的实现）。

trans-unit.source: POSIX requires that a domain error occurs if arg is zero, infinite, NaN, or if the correct result is outside of the range of int.
trans-unit.target: 如果 arg 为零，无穷大，NaN，或者正确的结果超出 int 的范围，则POSIX要求发生域错误。

trans-unit.source: POSIX specifies that the timezone information is determined by this function as if by calling tzset, which reads the environment variable TZ.
trans-unit.target: POSIX指定时区信息由此函数确定，就像调用tzset一样，后者读取环境变量 TZ 。

trans-unit.source: POSIX requires that a pole error occurs if arg is ±0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 arg 为±0，则POSIX要求发生极点误差。

trans-unit.source: POSIX specifies that all cases where std::lrint or std::llrint raise FE_INEXACT are domain errors.
trans-unit.target: POSIX指定 std::lrint 或 std::llrint 引发 FE_INEXACT 的所有情况都是域错误。

trans-unit.source: POSIX specifies that all cases where std::lround or std::llround raise FE_INEXACT are domain errors.
trans-unit.target: POSIX指定 std::lround 或 std::llround 引发 FE_INEXACT 的所有情况都是域错误。

trans-unit.source: POSIX specifies that the overflow and the underflow conditions are range errors (errno may be set).
trans-unit.target: POSIX指定上溢和下溢条件为范围错误（可以设置errno）。

trans-unit.source: POSIX requires that a domain error occurs if x is infinite or y is zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果 x 为无限或 y 为零，则POSIX要求发生域错误。

trans-unit.source: POSIX specifies many additional details for the behavior of this function.
trans-unit.target: POSIX为此功能的行为指定了许多其他详细信息。

trans-unit.source: POSIX requires that a domain error occurs if x is infinite or y is zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果 x 为无限或 y 为零，则POSIX要求发生域错误。

trans-unit.source: POSIX specifies many additional details on the semantics of this function, which are reproduced in C++ by std::experimental::filesystem::rename.
trans-unit.target: POSIX指定了有关此函数语义的许多其他细节，这些细节在C ++中由std :: experimental :: filesystem :: rename复制。

trans-unit.source: POSIX specifies that in case of underflow, arg is returned unmodified, and if that is not supported, and implementation-defined value no greater than DBL_MIN, FLT_MIN, and LDBL_MIN is returned.
trans-unit.target: POSIX指定在发生下溢的情况下，返回的 arg 将保持不变，如果不支持，则返回不大于DBL_MIN，FLT_MIN和LDBL_MIN的实现定义的值。

trans-unit.source: POSIX allows subsequent calls to strerror to invalidate the pointer value returned by an earlier call. It also specifies that it is the LC_MESSAGES locale facet that controls the contents of these messages.
trans-unit.target: POSIX允许对 strerror 的后续调用使先前调用返回的指针值无效。它还指定控制这些消息内容的是 LC_MESSAGES 语言环境。

trans-unit.source: POSIX specifies that in case of underflow, arg is returned unmodified, and if that is not supported, and implementation-defined value no greater than DBL_MIN, FLT_MIN, and LDBL_MIN is returned.
trans-unit.target: POSIX指定在发生下溢的情况下，返回的 arg 将保持不变，如果不支持，则返回不大于DBL_MIN，FLT_MIN和LDBL_MIN的实现定义的值。

trans-unit.source: POSIX requires that a pole error occurs if the argument is zero, but a domain error occurs when the argument is a negative integer. It also specifies that in future, domain errors may be replaced by pole errors for negative integer arguments (in which case the return value in those cases would change from NaN to ±∞).
trans-unit.target: POSIX要求如果参数为零，则发生极点错误，但如果参数为负整数，则发生域错误。它还指定了将来，对于负整数参数，可用极点误差来替换域误差（在这种情况下，这些情况下的返回值将从NaN变为±∞）。

trans-unit.source: Implicit conversion is defined in terms of copy-initialization: if an object of type T can be copy-initialized with expression E, then E is implicitly convertible to T.
trans-unit.target: 隐式转换在复制初始化来定义：如果类型的对象 T 可以是复制初始化表达 E ，然后 E 隐式转换为 T 。

trans-unit.source: Implicit conversions are defined between real floating types and integer types.
trans-unit.target: 隐式转换是在实数浮点型和整数型之间定义的。

trans-unit.target: 从左值到右值转换应用于类型 T 的glvalue ；

trans-unit.source: Incomplete types, pointers or references to incomplete types other than cv void*, and rvalue reference types are not allowed in the exception specification. Array and function types, if used, are adjusted to corresponding pointer types. parameter packs are allowed(since C++11).
trans-unit.target: 不完全类型，指针或比其他品种不完全类型的引用 void* ，和右值引用类型异常规范中是不允许的。数组和函数类型（如果使用）将调整为相应的指针类型。参数包是允许的（自C ++ 11起）。

trans-unit.source: incomplete types, abstract class types, and arrays thereof are not allowed: in particular, a class C cannot have a non-static data member of type C, although it can have a non-static data member of type C& (reference to C) or C* (pointer to C);
trans-unit.target: 不允许使用不完整的类型，抽象类类型及其数组：特别是，类 C 不能具有类型 C 的非静态数据成员，尽管它可以具有类型 C& 的非静态数据成员（引用C）或 C* （指向C的指针）；

Comparison operators are defined for pointers to objects in some situations: two pointers that represent the same address compare equal, two null pointer values compare equal, pointers to elements of the same array compare the same as the array indexes of those elements, and pointers to non-static data members with the same member access compare in order of declaration of those members.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，为对象的指针定义了比较运算符：代表相同地址的两个指针比较相等，两个空指针值比较相等，指向同一数组的元素的指针与这些元素的数组索引相同，并且指向具有相同成员访问权限的非静态数据成员按照这些成员的声明顺序进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Equality comparison operators are defined for pointers to functions (they compare equal if pointing to the same function).
trans-unit.target: 为函数的指针定义了相等比较运算符（如果指向同一函数，则它们比较相等）。

trans-unit.source: class member access operator applied to an expression of type T;
trans-unit.target: 类成员访问运算符应用于类型 T 的表达式;

trans-unit.source: operator precedence defines the order in which operators are bound to their arguments
trans-unit.target: 运算符优先级定义了运算符绑定到其参数的顺序

trans-unit.source: operator overloading makes it possible to specify the behavior of the operators with user-defined classes.

trans-unit.source: Variadic templates can also be used to create functions that take variable number of arguments. They are often the better choice because they do not impose restrictions on the types of the arguments, do not perform integral and floating-point promotions, and are type safe.

trans-unit.source: Template argument deduction and overload resolution is then performed for initialization of a fictional object of hypothetical class type, whose constructor signatures match the guides (except for return type) for the purpose of forming an overload set, and the initializer is provided by the context in which class template argument deduction was performed, except that the first phase of list-initialization (considering initializer-list constructors) is omitted if the initializer list consists of a single expression of type (possibly cv-qualified) U, where U is a specialization of C or a class derived from a specialization of C.
trans-unit.target: 然后执行模板参数推导和重载解析，以初始化假设类类型的虚拟对象，该虚构对象的构造函数签名与指南（返回类型除外）匹配以形成重载集，并且初始化程序由上下文中的这类模板参数推导进行，不同的是第一阶段的列表初始化（考虑初始化列表构造器）被省略，如果初始化列表由类型的单个表达（可能是CV-合格）的 U ，其中 U 是专业化的 C 或从的特殊化派生的类 C 。

trans-unit.source: prvalues of small integral types (such as char) may be converted to prvalues of larger integral types (such as int). In particular, arithmetic operators do not accept types smaller than int as arguments, and integral promotions are automatically applied after lvalue-to-rvalue conversion, if applicable. This conversion always preserves the value.

trans-unit.source: Pattern. This is the regular expression itself. It determines what constitutes a match. It is an object of type std::basic_regex, constructed from a string with special syntax. See syntax_option_type for the description of supported syntax variations.

trans-unit.source: Postcondition: Any copies of the previous value of i are no longer required to be either dereferenceable or to be in the domain of ==.
trans-unit.target: 后置条件：不再要求 i 的先前值的任何副本是可取消引用的或位于 == 的域中。

trans-unit.source: Precondition: (i, j) is in the domain of ==.

trans-unit.source: Replacement string. This is a string that determines how to replace the matches, see match_flag_type for the description of supported syntax variations.

trans-unit.source: #if, #ifdef and #ifndef directives test the specified condition (see below) and if it evaluates to true, compiles the controlled code block. In that case subsequent #else and #elif directives are ignored. Otherwise, if the specified condition evaluates false, the controlled code block is skipped and the subsequent #else or #elif directive (if any) is processed. In the former case, the code block controlled by the #else directive is unconditionally compiled. In the latter case, the #elif directive acts as if it was #if directive: checks for condition, compiles or skips the controlled code block based on the result, and in the latter case processes subsequent #elif and #else directives. The conditional preprocessing block is terminated by #endif directive.
trans-unit.target: #if ， #ifdef 和 #ifndef 指令测试指定的条件（请参见下文），如果结果为true，则编译受控代码块。在这种情况下，后续的 #else 和 #elif 指令将被忽略。否则，如果指定条件的计算结果为false，则将跳过受控代码块，并处理后续的 #else 或 #elif 指令（如果有）。在前一种情况下， #else 指令控制的代码块是无条件编译的。在后一种情况下， #elif 指令的作用就像是 #if 指令：检查条件，根据结果编译或跳过受控代码块，在后一种情况下，处理后续的 #elif 和 #else 指令。条件预处理块由 #endif 指令终止。
#ifdef 标识符本质上等效于 #if defined 标识符。
#ifndef 标识符本质上等效于 #if !defined 标识符。

trans-unit.source: #pragma once is a non-standard pragma that is supported by the vast majority of modern compilers. If it appears in a header file, it indicates that it is only to be parsed once, even if it is (directly or indirectly) included multiple times in the same source file.
trans-unit.target: #pragma once 是非标准的pragma，受到大多数现代编译器的支持。如果它出现在头文件中，则表明它仅被解析一次，即使它（直接或间接）多次包含在同一源文件中也是如此。

trans-unit.source: &&, ||, and , (comma) lose their special sequencing properties when overloaded and behave like regular function calls even when they are used without function-call notation.
trans-unit.target: && ， || 和 , （逗号）失去其特殊的顺序性过载，即使他们没有函数调用记法像普通函数表现调用时。
